name: Exploding Castles
description:
This is a prototype where you throw bombs at some castles and watch them explode. There's a small bunch of bomb types to choose from, and two castles to explode. This was made around 2017 and is a laggy mess, scrapped together with standard assets and borrowed models, but it's a prototype, so leave me alone.

(Models come from the standard models in MagicaVoxel. Textures from Unity standard assets. Fractures in models and everything else in the prototype is original.)

Controls

WASD  -  Movement

Mouse  -  Look

Left Click  -  Throw Bomb

Numpad (1-7)  -  Select Bomb

P  -  pause

'~'  -  Reset castles
